tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Species_Diversity (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  environment VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  population_size INT,
  genetic_variation FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE individuals (
    individual_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    population_id INT,
    individual_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE environments (
    environment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    environment_name VARCHAR(255),
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT,
    terrain VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Diversity (
  diversity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  environment_id INT,
  diversity_index FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES Species(species_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (environment_id) REFERENCES Environment(environment_id)
);
